actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to prohibit use of the mails to effect certain sales or other deliveries of mailing lists for purposes of commercial or other solicitation, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits the use of the mails to effect specified sales or other deliveries of mailing lists for purposes of commercial or other solicitation. (Amends 39 U.S.C. 3001)

titles.title: A bill to prohibit use of the mails to effect certain sales or other deliveries of mailing lists for purposes of commercial or other solicitation, and for other purposes.
